reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress well-made and flattering, particularly appreciating its sexy plunge front and how it accentuates curves.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish Sophistication
items.body: I recently purchased the IHOT Women's Sexy V Neck Sleeveless Faux Wrap Ruched Sheath Bodycon Dress for a cocktail party and was thoroughly impressed. This dress is a blend of elegance, comfort, and style, making it a fantastic choice for various occasions, from casual gatherings to more formal events. The dress features a flattering V-neckline and a sleeveless design, which together create a sophisticated yet alluring look. The faux wrap style, combined with the ruched detailing, accentuates the body in all the right places, offering a flattering silhouette that is both stylish and comfortable. One of the standout features of this dress is the fabric. It's soft, stretchy, and hugs the body without being restrictive, allowing for ease of movement throughout the evening. The quality of the material is impressive – it's thick enough to feel substantial and offers a smooth, luxurious feel against the skin. The versatility of the dress is another plus. It's suitable for a variety of settings, including casual work events, parties, and dinners. The simplicity of the design also makes it easy to accessorize, whether you're aiming for a bold statement or a more understated look. As for fit, the dress runs true to size. I ordered my usual size, and it fit perfectly, highlighting my curves while still being comfortable. The length was also appropriate, hitting just above the knee, which made it ideal for a cocktail party. Dress is true to size. Read more
items.author: rosie sandoval

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Danced the Night Away in the IHOT Bodycon Dress!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I recently wore the IHOT Women's Sexy V Neck Sleeveless Dress in a stunning blue to a friend's birthday party, where we danced salsa all night. This dress was not just a hit; it made my evening special! The fabric is remarkably soft and stretchy, providing comfort and a flattering fit without being see-through. Dancing in it was a breeze thanks to its lightweight nature and the ruched wrap design, which beautifully accentuated my curves while cleverly hiding my tummy. What I loved most about this dress was its deep V-neck and the tulip hem, which added just the right touch of elegance and style. The length was perfect—short enough to keep me cool while dancing and long enough to maintain decency as we twirled around. The dress’s versatility is also worth noting. It’s great for a salsa night and suitable for various occasions like cocktail parties, weddings, or evening dinners. The back zipper made it easy to slip in and out of, adding convenience to its stylish design. In summary, the IHOT Bodycon Dress exceeded my expectations. It fit perfectly, felt comfortable all evening, and kept me looking fabulous. If you're looking for a dress that combines elegance with comfort for your next party, this is the one! Read more
items.author: ✅Maya Acosta✅

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous fit, flattering and sexy.
items.body: This dress is a fabulous fit. The material is thick enough to flatter without being too hot. The length shows off leg without risk of being inappropriate or flashing someone. The top is a little low cut, and ladies with smaller chests may find it too big/loose. For women with a decent bust, the look is def sexy. Would recommend this dress! It looks spectacular on! Read more
items.author: Spinclassdoctor

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Get it, you can’t go wrong
items.body: Ok, this is truly a super. Ute and flattering dress, I get a large based off the comments and it’s perfect not too tight or loose. Shows enough cleavage to make you feel sexy but not too much. The rouching is perfect. I will order other colors… great basic staple dress.. Read more
items.author: Corina H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best dress I've found & delivered to my door. A WIN, WIN.
items.body: Perfect fit. The quality is great. I initially ordered a small, but felt that it was too tight looking across the rear. The medium was a much better fit. The red is beautiful, although there was a slight color difference in the same red color in small and the medium size. I love this dress and the price is really reasonable. I'm 5'3, 126 lbs. I usually have trouble with a dress for because I am top heavy and normally a size 6 in pants. This style is very accommodating for that issue Read more
items.author: CYNDI

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thicker material perfect fit exactly as size description !
items.body: Was absolutely perfect great material super comfortable ! Read more
items.author: Jessica Carroll

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs big
items.body: Love this dress. Nice quality with liner. I would give it 5 stars if it fit me. I’m 5ft3” & 107 lbs. Im short waisted so the shoulders fall down. I will see if a seamstress can take in top straps before I start return. Read more
items.author: Holly M Brown

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE
items.body: I LOVE this dress. It is sexy but not too sexy. The material is thick and stretchy. I have larger breasts and the dress held them in without showing too much cleavage. I wear a size 36H bra size. I received many compliments on the dress. The length was perfect for me at 5’2”. I would say the dress is true to size. For reference I’m wearing a Medium and I can wear either medium or large. I also purchased the Large but it was loose in the breast and stomach area. Read more
items.author: CSA72

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Ruched Bodycon Cocktail Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress V Neck Ruched Bodycon Cocktail Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Ruched Bodycon Cocktail Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sequin Wine Red, Sequin Black, Grey Blue, Black, Glitter-peacock-blue, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Navy, Sequin Navy, Wine Red, White, Coral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
